00018 // keep actual size of packed structure
00019 #pragma pack(push, 1)
00020 class SampleEx
00021 {
00022 public:
00023     SampleEx(int iNumAlleles = 2);
00024         ~SampleEx();
00025 
00026 public:
00027     uint8_t getCall() { return m_byCall; }
00028     void setCall(uint8_t by) { m_byCall = by; }
00029     int getCallInt() { return (int8_t)m_byCall; }
00030 
00031         float getConfidence() { return m_fConfidence; }
00032         void setConfidence(float f) { m_fConfidence = f; }
00033 
00034         float getLogRatio() { return m_fLogRatio; }
00035         void setLogRatio(float f) { m_fLogRatio = f; }
00036         
00037         float getStrength() { return m_fStrength; }
00038         void setStrength(float f) { m_fStrength = f; }
00039 
00040     int getNumAlleles() { return (int)m_vAlleleSignals.size(); }
00041     std::vector<float>& getAlleleSignals() { return m_vAlleleSignals; }
00042     float getAlleleSignal(int index) { return m_vAlleleSignals[index]; }
00043     void setAlleleSignal(int index, float signal) { m_vAlleleSignals[index] = signal; }
00044 
00045 public:
00046         void reset();
00047     void init(int iNumAlleles);
00048     size_t format(char* szData, int iSampleMultiplier = 1);
00049     size_t formatNext(char*& szData, int iSampleMultiplier = 1);
00050     bool parse(char* szData, int numAlleles);
00051     bool parseNext(char*& szData, int numAlleles);
00052     float computeLogRatio(); // contrast
00053     float computeStrength(); // size
00054     std::string getSampleStr();
00055 
00056 private:
00057     uint8_t m_byCall;
00058     float m_fConfidence;
00059     float m_fLogRatio;
00060     float m_fStrength;
00061     std::vector<float> m_vAlleleSignals;
00062 };
00063 #pragma pack(pop)

00108 class AlleleSignalEx
00109 {
00110 public:
00111     AlleleSignalEx(int iNumAlleles = 2);
00112     AlleleSignalEx(float fAAlleleSignal, float fBAlleleSignal);
00113     ~AlleleSignalEx();
00114 
00115 public:
00116     float getAlleleSignal(int index) { return (float)m_arAlleleSignals[index * sizeof(float)]; }
00117     void setAlleleSignal(int index, float f) { memcpy(&m_arAlleleSignals[index * sizeof(float)], &f, sizeof(float)); }
00118 
00119 public:
00120     void reset();
00121     void init(int iNumAlleles);
00122 
00123 private:
00124     uint8_t* m_arAlleleSignals;
00125     int m_iNumAlleles;
00126 };
